<Link id="l00060" /><CodeLine lineNumber="60"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00061" /><CodeLine lineNumber="61"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Since SPIR-V cannot represent constant expression, constant expressions</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00062" /><CodeLine lineNumber="62"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// in LLVM IR need to be lowered to instructions. For each function,</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00063" /><CodeLine lineNumber="63"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// the constant expressions used by instructions of the function are replaced</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00064" /><CodeLine lineNumber="64"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// by instructions placed in the entry block since it dominates all other BBs.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00065" /><CodeLine lineNumber="65"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Each constant expression only needs to be lowered once in each function</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00066" /><CodeLine lineNumber="66"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// and all uses of it by instructions in that function are replaced by</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00067" /><CodeLine lineNumber="67"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// one instruction.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00068" /><CodeLine lineNumber="68"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// TODO: remove redundant instructions for common subexpression.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00069" /><CodeLine lineNumber="69"><Highlight kind="normal">void <a href="/docs/api/structs/anonymous-namespace-spirvregularizer-cpp-/spirvregularizer/#afc96d81c4b2ba8a3e77680438999aa40">SPIRVRegularizer</a>::runLowerConstExpr(<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/function">Function</a> &amp;<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#a96d73bbd7af15cb1fc38c3f4a3bd82e9">F</a>) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00077" /><CodeLine lineNumber="77"><Highlight kind="normal">    Instruction &#42;II = WorkList.front();</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00078" /><CodeLine lineNumber="78"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00079" /><CodeLine lineNumber="79"><Highlight kind="normal">    auto LowerOp = &#91;&amp;II, &amp;FBegin, &amp;F&#93;(Value &#42;V) -&gt; Value &#42; &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00080" /><CodeLine lineNumber="80"><Highlight kind="normal">      if (isa&lt;Function&gt;(V))</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00082" /><CodeLine lineNumber="82"><Highlight kind="normal">      auto &#42;CE = cast&lt;ConstantExpr&gt;(V);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00083" /><CodeLine lineNumber="83"><Highlight kind="normal">      LLVM&#95;DEBUG(dbgs() &lt;&lt; </Highlight><Highlight kind="stringliteral">&quot;&#91;lowerConstantExpressions&#93; &quot;</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> &lt;&lt; &#42;CE);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00084" /><CodeLine lineNumber="84"><Highlight kind="normal">      auto ReplInst = CE-&gt;getAsInstruction();</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00085" /><CodeLine lineNumber="85"><Highlight kind="normal">      auto InsPoint = II-&gt;getParent() == &amp;&#42;FBegin ? II : &amp;FBegin-&gt;back();</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00086" /><CodeLine lineNumber="86"><Highlight kind="normal">      ReplInst-&gt;insertBefore(InsPoint-&gt;getIterator());</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00087" /><CodeLine lineNumber="87"><Highlight kind="normal">      LLVM&#95;DEBUG(dbgs() &lt;&lt; </Highlight><Highlight kind="stringliteral">&quot; -&gt; &quot;</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> &lt;&lt; &#42;ReplInst &lt;&lt; </Highlight><Highlight kind="stringliteral">&#39;\\n&#39;</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00088" /><CodeLine lineNumber="88"><Highlight kind="normal">      std::vector&lt;Instruction &#42;&gt; Users;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00089" /><CodeLine lineNumber="89"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Do not replace use during iteration of use. Do it in another loop.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00090" /><CodeLine lineNumber="90"><Highlight kind="normal">      for (auto U : CE-&gt;users()) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00091" /><CodeLine lineNumber="91"><Highlight kind="normal">        LLVM&#95;DEBUG(dbgs() &lt;&lt; </Highlight><Highlight kind="stringliteral">&quot;&#91;lowerConstantExpressions&#93; Use: &quot;</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> &lt;&lt; &#42;U &lt;&lt; </Highlight><Highlight kind="stringliteral">&#39;\\n&#39;</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00092" /><CodeLine lineNumber="92"><Highlight kind="normal">        auto InstUser = dyn&#95;cast&lt;Instruction&gt;(U);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00093" /><CodeLine lineNumber="93"><Highlight kind="normal">        </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Only replace users in scope of current function.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00094" /><CodeLine lineNumber="94"><Highlight kind="normal">        if (InstUser &amp;&amp; InstUser-&gt;getParent()-&gt;getParent() == &amp;F)</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00095" /><CodeLine lineNumber="95"><Highlight kind="normal">          Users.push&#95;back(InstUser);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00096" /><CodeLine lineNumber="96"><Highlight kind="normal">      &#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00097" /><CodeLine lineNumber="97"><Highlight kind="normal">      for (auto &amp;User : Users) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00098" /><CodeLine lineNumber="98"><Highlight kind="normal">        if (ReplInst-&gt;getParent() == User-&gt;getParent() &amp;&amp;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00099" /><CodeLine lineNumber="99"><Highlight kind="normal">            User-&gt;comesBefore(ReplInst))</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00100" /><CodeLine lineNumber="100"><Highlight kind="normal">          ReplInst-&gt;moveBefore(User-&gt;getIterator());</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00101" /><CodeLine lineNumber="101"><Highlight kind="normal">        User-&gt;replaceUsesOfWith(CE, ReplInst);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00102" /><CodeLine lineNumber="102"><Highlight kind="normal">      &#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00103" /><CodeLine lineNumber="103"><Highlight kind="normal">      return ReplInst;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00104" /><CodeLine lineNumber="104"><Highlight kind="normal">    &#125;;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00105" /><CodeLine lineNumber="105"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00106" /><CodeLine lineNumber="106"><Highlight kind="normal">    WorkList.pop&#95;front();</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00107" /><CodeLine lineNumber="107"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">auto</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> LowerConstantVec = &#91;&amp;<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/nvptx/nvvmintrrange-cpp/#ac5804672fc0850438d63caec770647f8">II</a>, &amp;LowerOp, &amp;WorkList,</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00108" /><CodeLine lineNumber="108"><Highlight kind="normal">                             &amp;Ctx&#93;(<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/constantvector">ConstantVector</a> &#42;Vec,</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00110" /><CodeLine lineNumber="110"><Highlight kind="normal">      if (std::all&#95;of(Vec-&gt;op&#95;begin(), Vec-&gt;op&#95;end(), &#91;&#93;(Value &#42;V) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00224" /><CodeLine lineNumber="224"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// This produces an instruction sequence that implements a splat of</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00225" /><CodeLine lineNumber="225"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// CI-&gt;getOperand(1) to a vector Arg0Ty. However, we use InsertElementInst</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00226" /><CodeLine lineNumber="226"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// and ShuffleVectorInst to generate the same code as the SPIR-V translator.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00227" /><CodeLine lineNumber="227"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// For instance (transcoding/OpMin.ll), this call</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00228" /><CodeLine lineNumber="228"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">//   call spir&#95;func &lt;2 x i32&gt; @&#95;Z3minDv2&#95;ii(&lt;2 x i32&gt; &lt;i32 1, i32 10&gt;, i32 5)</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00229" /><CodeLine lineNumber="229"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// is translated to</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00230" /><CodeLine lineNumber="230"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">//    %8 = OpUndef %v2uint</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00231" /><CodeLine lineNumber="231"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">//   %14 = OpConstantComposite %v2uint %uint&#95;1 %uint&#95;10</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00232" /><CodeLine lineNumber="232"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">//   ...</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00233" /><CodeLine lineNumber="233"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">//   %10 = OpCompositeInsert %v2uint %uint&#95;5 %8 0</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00234" /><CodeLine lineNumber="234"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">//   %11 = OpVectorShuffle %v2uint %10 %8 0 0</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00235" /><CodeLine lineNumber="235"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// %call = OpExtInst %v2uint %1 s&#95;min %14 %11</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
